output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number in the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Nicolae Ciucă, who is a presidential candidate (Position 4 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook advertisement with significant reach (3000-3999 impressions) and targets a large estimated audience (over 1 million).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly promotes Nicolae Ciucă as "viitorul președinte al României" (the future president of Romania) and specifically discusses his presidential prospects.
5. Journalism: While presented on a news platform (PS News), the content appears to be campaign messaging rather than objective journalism, as it directly promotes a candidate's presidential aspirations.
6. Personal opinion: This is not a personal opinion but rather an official party communication through a senior party official (Bode, PNL Secretary General).
The post is clearly electoral propaganda as it: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Nicolae Ciucă) - Is being distributed during the restricted period - Has a clear electoral objective - Is paid promotion reaching a wide audience - Goes beyond journalistic information

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes Nicolae Ciucă as a presidential candidate - Uses paid promotion to reach a wide audience - Has clear electoral messaging about "viitorul președinte" - Is distributed through official party channels - Goes beyond mere news reporting
conclusion.message-for-police: PS News și Partidul Național Liberal, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei de campanie, constând în promovarea candidatului Nicolae Ciucă la funcția de președinte prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID: 532419989618931). Materialul prezintă în mod explicit susținerea candidatului pentru funcția de președinte al României, depășind caracterul informativ-jurnalistic și având scop electoral evident. Publicarea și promovarea acestui material după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 reprezintă o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
